name: Stay Safe Granny
description:
Created for StaySafeJam, the theme is Solidarity. 

Game Created by:

  • Justin Aloisi
  • Amanda Kirk
  • Miguel Mendes
  • Axel Stewart

    • You moved to Brooklyn a few years ago to help your grandmother and build  your writing career. About a year ago you finally found a publisher and have an advance on your upcoming novel and are very grateful for the support you've recieved from your granny's friends during the process. Now its your time to give back to them, they are scared to go outside because they fear they will get Coronavirus. Help them by running groceries so they can have fresh vegetables and meat, pick up their pharmacy orders and bring joy to their hearts.
